|cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A9 |cpu1spd = 800 |is_doc = |bus = |flash1type = |fla1_num = |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L6406E; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = |ram1type = |ram1type1 = |ram1spd = |ram1size = 128 |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B1G1646G-BCH9; |ram1_num = |nvramsize = |eth_cpu = true |sw_cpu = true |lan_ports = 5 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = |portbasedvlan = |802.1qvlan = |auto_mdix = |sup_jumbo = |ethoui = |oui = |bootwait = |stockbootloader = |stockos = |exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2.5 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = |jtag = |specialfeat = |flags = DFS, |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Richwave;RTC6649E;088, 649E, 310;2; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC w/ Power Detector;Skyworks;SE5003L1;;2; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac |defaulip = 192.168.1.250 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = password |defaultssid = NETGEAR_EXT |defaultssid_regex = ^NETGEAR_EXT$ |default_ch = |manuf = Foxconn |manuf_model = U12H269 |manuf_rev = T00 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = DD-WRT |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/05/2013 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = 606449099751 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B00HQ883QW |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = Vietnam |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM4352;BCM4352KMLG, TE1311 P20, 273012 3 W; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |nqam1 = |rad1n = 300 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 5 |rad1correv = |rad1cap = |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43217;BCM43217KMLG, HT1313 P10, 276786 6 W; |rad2oui = |rad2_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA |rad2txchains = 2 |rad2rxchains = 2 |rad2sstreams = 2 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam2 = |rad2n = 300 |rad2g = 54 |rad2b = 11 |rad2freq = 2.4 |rad2correv = |rad2cap = }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "U12H269T00", "801494", and "REV: 0 GP" is silkscreened on the board. *OEM: [[Foxconn]] ([[Ambit]]) [https://github.com/mirror/dd-wrt/blob/master/src/router/netgear/ambitCfg-ex6200.h U12H269T00] *OEM: U12H269T01 The default SSID for this device seems to be '''NETGEAR_EXT'''. ==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32355-netgear-ex6200-ac1200-high-power-wifi-range-extender-reviewed ''Netgear EX6200 AC1200 WiFi Range Extender'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] *CPU: [[Broadcom]] BCM4708A0 or BCM4708A1 (guess) *2.4GHz Radio: [[Broadcom]] BCM43217 2x2 802.11bgn :''Richwave'' RTC6649E - 2.4GHz Power Amp (088 649E 310) *5GHz Radio: [[Broadcom]] BCM4352KMLG 2x2 802.11an/ac :''Skyworks'' SE5003L1 - 5GHz Power Amplifier (23dBm) *[https://openitforum.pl/index/recenzje/network/apoints/netgear-ex6200-r223/ ''Netgear EX6200'' Reviewed on '''OpenITforum'''] ===CES 2014 coverage=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/other/ces-2014/32299-netgear-ces-2014-announcements ''NETGEAR CES 2014 Announcements'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] ==JTAG-Serial Info== ===Serial=== ====Serial Pinouts==== The serial header is '''J252'''. This applies for U12H269T01. 
              J252
(GND) (RxD) (TxD) (3.3)
Pin1  Pin2  Pin3  Pin4
[[Category:English Documentation]]
